ing: 1 tablespoon fresh, coarsely ground black pepper
1 onion, sliced and separated into rings
n: Marinated Cucumber, Onion, and Tomato Salad
des: "This is an easy salad that is perfect for a warm summer day."
ins:
Whisk water, vinegar, oil, sugar, salt, and pepper together in a large bowl until smooth; add cucumbers, tomatoes, and onion and stir to coat.
Cover bowl with plastic wrap; refrigerate at least 2 hours.
